content: Phase 0: Replace string-based type checking with TypeKind enum in type_discovery.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after Phase 0 changes
Phase 1.1: Add set_field method to JsonFieldAccess trait in string_traits.rs
Phase 1.2: Add BevyBrpMcpTypeHint variant to SchemaField enum in types.rs
Phase 1.3: Add JsonSchemaType enum to types.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after Phase 1 infrastructure changes
Phase 1.4: Add get_full_registry function to registry_cache.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after registry cache changes
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Phase 2.1: Create schema_processor.rs with SchemaProcessor type
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after creating schema_processor
Phase 2.2: Create engine_v2.rs with TypeSchemaEngineV2
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after creating engine_v2
Phase 2.3: Add TypeInfoV2 and TypeSchemaResponseV2 to result_types.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after adding V2 types
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Phase 3a.1: Create tool_v2.rs with TypeSchemaV2 that uses only the new engine
Phase 3a.2: Add BrpTypeSchemaV2 variant to ToolName enum
Phase 3a.3: Wire up handlers, parameters, and annotations for the V2 tool
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after Phase 3a changes
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Run cargo nextest run
STOP if test failures - review with user
STOP and ask user to reinstall MCP tool for testing Phase 3b
